title: Policy rate
text:
The purpose of this document is to present the process of creating the plot that shows the evolution of the repo rate of the central bank of Colombia: Banco de la República. The information is made public by this institution and you can replicate this exercise downloading the information here.
The first step is to load the following libraries:
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

title: Policy rate
text:
Graph

ggplot(data) +
  geom_step(aes(x=Fecha, y=`Tasa de política monetaria(Dato diario)`), color="darkblue") +
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 year", date_labels = "%m-%Y") +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,14, by = 2)) +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(title = "Tasa de intervención de política monetaria",
       subtitle = "(periodicidad mensual)",
       x = "Mes-Año",
       y = "Tasa (%)",
       caption = "Fuente: Elaboración propia con datos del Banco de la República, TIP") +
  theme(plot.caption.position = "panel",
        plot.caption = element_text(hjust = 0))

title: Policy rate
text:
Conclusion
In the previous graph we can see the latest monetary policy decisions by the Banco de la República regarding the REPO rate. Since the constitutional instruction is to maintain the purchasing power of the different agents of the economy and the inflation expectations anchored to a interval, we can observe that the REPO rate escalated quite rapid in order to contain the raising inflation after the pandemic. It is worth mentioning that the latest minutes report discretion about reducing very quickly the interest rate levels, due to inflation expectations and external financing conditions.
